name: As Moot as a Glutton Trivia Game | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
As cold as ice.

	Or, colder than a witch's t_ _.

As easy as pie.

	Pie is actually not at all easy (to make, this is)--at least piecrust isn't.

As happy as a clam.

	ARE clams happy? How can anyone tell? Or 'As happy as a pig in s_ _ _.'

As solid as a rock.

	Like the Rock of Gibraltar. Rock of Ages cleft for me....

As dry as a bone.

	Yeah, but some bones are juicy.

Quick like a bunny.

	As fleet as a deer.

questions.text: As auburn as a spool (not a perfect rhyme)
questions.explanation:
As stubborn as a mule.

	Is this actually true of mules? I bet most people are more so.

As soft as silk.

	Or, rose-petal soft.

As sick as a dog.

	This is how you feel after you eat like a pig.

As dumb as a post.

	Or, not packing a full seabag.
